item.title: Chapter 12. Linux Binary Compatibility
item.description:
12.1. Synopsis

FreeBSD provides optional binary compatibility with LinuxÂ®, commonly referred to as Linuxulator, allowing users to install and run unmodified Linux binaries. It is available for the x86 (both 32 and 64 bit) and AArch64 architectures. Some Linux-specific operating system features are not yet supported; this mostly happens with functionality specific to hardware or related to system management, such as cgroups or namespaces.

Before reading this chapter, you should:
